definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Thus, it was equipped with powerful air-to-ground cluster rockets.
sentences.chinese: 因此，她配備了強大的空對地集束火箭彈。

sentences.english: It also allows simultaneous air-to-air and air-to-ground capabilities.
sentences.chinese: 同時它也改進空對空和空對地能力。

sentences.english: This thesis also do a research on air-to-ground attack.
sentences.chinese: 本文還對空對地攻擊進行了研究。

sentences.english: The Terrans with their banshee, is very very powerful anti-ground unit.
sentences.chinese: 人族有女妖戰機這種非常強力的空對地單位。
